LanguageData.BB_Kestrel.label: Kestrel
LanguageData.BB_Kestrel.description: A falcon noted for the prominent sexual dimorphism of their plumage, with the males having a blue-grey cap. The kestrel feeds almost exclusively upon small mammals, aided by its ability to see near ultraviolet light, and performs a characteristic hovering flight whilst hunting.
LanguageData.BB_Kestrel.tools.talons.label: talons
LanguageData.BB_Kestrel.tools.beak.label: beak
LanguageData.BB_Kestrel.tools.head.label: head
